<title level="1" right="Rules">[Scroll Statistics](/Rules.aspx?ID=3199)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 262 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
All scrolls have the same base statistics unless noted otherwise. A scroll has light Bulk and must be held in one hand to be activated.
</column>
